hes not stopping Adrienne I believe just won't be on here...like that. Hes =
looking for people that respect him and not talk down to him about what he =
has basically created. He'll be fine.

--- On Mon, 1/3/11, Adrienne B <abor=
tree@...> wrote:


From: Adrienne B <abortree@...>
Subject: Re:=
 [EVP-ITC] Re: The case for faces.
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday=
, January 3, 2011, 1:06 AM


=C2=A0 



Yes, wow.. I don't know what to say=
. =C2=A0I've belonged to the group for 3-4 days. Your reputation and experi=
ence/experiments were =C2=A0the main reason and I learned afterwards of the=
 others with experience. =C2=A0I can only apologize if my question was the =
straw. =C2=A0Thank you for explaining the history, Frank. =C2=A0Sorry it's =
been so wearing on you. =C2=A0Hope you find what you're looking for.


On S=
un, Jan 2, 2011 at 12:39 PM, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...> =
wrote:


=C2=A0 



Well, for one thing, I don't own the group anymore. Due=
 to one of these incessent argurments, I had to back away from this some ye=
ars ago as I almost got fired becuase yet someone else that thought they kn=
ew so much more forwarded all my e-mails to my boss. 

Then someone else se=
emed to be insinuating that I may have tampered with the imgaes. Very insul=
ting. This stuff goes on an on, regardless of the quality of voices, or the=
 images. I have reached my saturation point. There seems to be nothing more=
 to be gained by presenting anything else. Now, I can sympatize with Richar=
d Roberts!

The group will continue, as there are a number of box and paran=
ormal experts here that are more than happy to tell everyone what this stuf=
f really is and how it works. 

I didn't mean to create bad any feelings.

=
F-S




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Adrienne" <abortree@...> wrote:
>
=
> Hi 
> 
> Thank you for getting back to me. I thought I had destroyed the =
group by accident. Awful feeling! 
> 
> I completely understand and am very=
 grateful that he started this group and is willing to share and let share =
ideas and files. God forbid he should leave!! I'm not used to looking at vi=
deo this way so it would be easy for me to miss a lot. I did see the Upside=
 Down Lincoln and the face at the end in the second attachment of "If this =
is the only one..." I need more practice and a more open mind, I think. Thi=
s is all so far reaching. Thank goodness he, especially (and the others in =
this group) are doing this and sharing these ideas. Kudos to Frank for all =
of his work!
> 
> -Adrienne
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ursula Kal=
in <kalinu@> wrote:
> >
> > I'm glad you took another look..hey listen we a=
ll are learning here..that message was not solely to you..I never saw you t=
ry to correct anyone on what they where hearing but some on here does ALOT.=
..its starting to sound as if they feel like they knew more then anyone and=
 most just started doing this where..Frank,Steve and some other have been d=
oing this for years..Some even have the nerve to try to talk done to Frank.=
.now remember this is the man the made the box..so i just think its insulti=
ng and ignorant. I for one will be really pissed of if they ran him from hi=
s own group..
> >

 understand yet, sorry.
> > 
> > Thank you for making me go back and look a=
gain.
> > 
> > -Adrienne

<purplealiengirl@> wrote:

ded in sound, it's related to speech, and
> > > > not just EVP. It seems to=
 be a normal function of our own minds(living or
> > > > dead), the same as=
 reverse speech. I found some faces in old EVPs from boxes
> > > > and also=
 in music files. The ones from Evanescence are pretty impressive in
> > > >=
 person, and do not seem to be intentionaly embedded.
> > > > 
> > > > I kn=
ow, it's not ghost hunters, and most don't want to have to think.

 think most want this stuff in a neat little box, all well defined, all

rse

ank,

I it would be helpful to see something a little more definitive that couldn=
't be mistaken for matrixing. Is this possible? Is it just me?

> > >=
 - Adrienne
